text: How can a mortal resist him!
Alphonse Dolmancé's mastery of debauchery and his alliance with Slaanesh have granted him insights into the construction and management of establishments dedicated to sinful pleasures.

Alphonse Dolmancé's unwavering devotion to Slaanesh enhances his ability to inspire and lead those who serve the Lord of Excess. His presence significantly boosts the efficiency and output of Devotee buildings in his domains.

Alphonse Dolmancé, an agent of pleasure and decadence, possesses a unique talent for blurring the lines between the extravagant and the humble. In his presence, even the lowly peasant units revel in the same ecstasy as their more exalted counterparts, fighting with newfound vigor on the battlefield.
